item.title: How Trump Can Release Biden’s Regulatory Brake
item.description: Here are some actions the president can take in his first week in office to kickstart deregulatory efforts.

item.title: The GOP’s New Coalition Requires a New Economic Agenda
item.description: Help the needy, not the greedy, as a wise man once argued.

item.title: Senators tee up post-Thanksgiving votes on more of Biden's judicial nominees
item.description: The Senate departed for its Thanksgiving break Thursday with a deal in place to vote on six of President Biden's judicial nominees when they return.

item.title: It’s Past Time We Bring Back The Washington Redskins
item.description: The Washington football franchise must right its previous wrong by bringing back its 'Redskins' team name.

item.title: Biden Rewards Planned Parenthood’s Baby Murder By Giving Its High Priestess A Presidential Medal Of Freedom
item.description: During the 13 years Cecile Richards led Planned Parenthood, more than 13 million babies were killed before their births in the United States.

item.title: The GOP Establishment Is A Greater Threat To Trump’s Agenda Than Democrats
item.description: The defeat of Matt Gaetz’s nomination for attorney general shows that this time, Trump really does have to drain the swamp.

item.title: Sanction the Disgraceful ICC
item.description: Issuing arrest warrants against Israeli leaders for their just war against Hamas is a moral abomination from an illegitimate body.

item.title: Trump Needs an AG Who Is Not His Personal Lawyer
item.description: Before diving into another fiasco reminiscent of the Matt Gaetz nomination, he and his transition team need to think this through carefully.

item.title: Pete Hegseth Is Right for the DOD
item.description: If the U.S. military wants to maintain its standing with the American people, its leadership needs to display some moral courage.

item.title: To Restore Democracy Trump Will Have To Overcome Administrative State Tyranny
item.description: The second Trump administration was elected as the antidote to the administrative state — to make radical changes in personnel and policy.

item.title: Bob Casey concedes to David McCormick in Pennsylvania Senate race
item.description: Sen. Bob Casey, Pennsylvania Democrat, officially conceded defeat in his re-election bid.
